name: Trail Grazer (GCS Jam 2018 Submission)
description:
Get coin, make enemy, run away. Simple.

This is my first project in Unity. The theme of the Jam is "Learning". I figured I'd take the opportunity to give myself a crash course on how Unity works, as well as pump out a little idea I had involving objects following a path. There is so much I don't know about Unity and C# in general, but this is a start!
